post.body: i've left it to them now…did u see my follow up tweet tho? 200 was per year not month in the end!!
I nominate @mcawilliams for a Shorty Award in #personal because he's one personable sunuvabitch
you seem to have this category in the bag anyway http://www.shortyawards.com/category/ttqtd
last minute is the only time to get any of that done…although I always end up regretting not doing it online!!
that's exactly how I use facebook.. I don't think of it as a work /networking thing but as a way to keep in touch w RL friends
given up on the Christmas avatar already? that didn't last long
jaysus that's a good one.. no shame!
twinkleshots.com is on the blink... @MGMH took it down
INLAND EMPIRE for Film KNIGHT III?
turned out to be an annual fee!! client typo when emailing me!: )
please do : ) I want the internet to stop snowing!
@anthonymcg @Padraig cheers.. I've informed the client that ESAT are overpricing and/or overspecing (how's that for a word‽)
Fin. Bon nuit.
hoping to have a diagram or two to show at Film Knight III myself
i don't think done it poorly counts…it's up to you now to do it properly…seriously…run with it
we're very grateful developers today, thank God for WP, thank Jesus for EE!
beyond bland! crikey!
@goodonpaper lovely tip.. cheers
had a client who wanted CC nums encrypted on server but then unencrypted and sent to them by email so they wouldn't have to log in
the interface is a bit overloaded too…but I'm looking forward to 2.0 & plan on using it on another couple of sites at least
it seems powerful alright.. i'm just hitting a few niggly bits and don't have the experience to know how to resolve issues easily
it is a blissful place…just wish I worked there
I imagine yes you must have since that's the sensible and careful way to work
"Pasión en Japón por la sangre" http://bit.ly/DXmd
holy shit!!
did you just lose 2 followers cos of that tweet then?: )
cheers man, went well.. time to write the user manual now.. well, after lunch!
ooo two tweetie recommendations in reply to that tweet.. certainly must give it a go
will check with my accountant
tight… but not impossible; )
will do… it's up on Parnell St anyhow… will be in touch with details
aye indeed… now or never as they say… gonna give it a shot, a real good shot (genuinely no pun intended on the photo blog!!: )
don't think i've seen it… night is a really just an informal laugh… watch a few shorts… drink… smoke… watch a film
date is the day I leave Ireland… the number of days is an (almost) random day in the future where I've no idea where I'll be
my photo blog starts jan 12th… 1 photo a day for the next 516 days… look forward to seeing what becomes of http://day516.com
could let u off the hook on bringing a new short along but if uv anything u'd like to show us that'd be fun
'@' away, I don't mind: ) fancy coming to 'film night' friday? think I was telling u bout it before
ah good I thought so : ) lovely pics thought… sorry I missed the night… blog first, bloggers lunch later tho yeah: )
I thought the chopped heads were part of the art direction, no? ; )
no shiny happy buttons in next iteration of exceptional then?: )
it *is* all about impressing your friends no?: )
yeah been looking at that.. seems promising.. http://jungledisk.com is another one I'm looking at.. will decide 2m
ah very nice… that looks like something I could handle: )
rsync looks over my head a bit to be honest… hoping to find a convenient commercially available service
itunes uses the word "harvesting"?
‰ ‰ ‰ ‰ ‰ ‰ spurt ‰ ‰ splatter ‰ splunk ‰ ‰ ‰ FAIL
Expression Engine is killing me… slowly… but… surely ¬
sickener: realised a bunch of prep work I did in UK last week got deleted when I re-cloned a HD over the portable I was carrying — thick!
There's a teeny light switch in the little cupboard under my nana's stairs that turns on/off the light in the dining room
mobileMe should sync wifi passwords with my iPhone.. that would be da bomb thanks very much
not easy to make make adjustment to an invoice already sent in Billings 2.0 — well impossible, need to delete and do a dance re the the num
Re ESAT hosting: client responds "sorry re: my typo - the cost is €200 per annum" : )
don't really wanna get involved in organising hosting but think I should at least advise that it seems very much on the expensive side
found maggots on chocolate tree decorations that got put back in the box after last Christmas
first listen this year to Phil Spector's Christmas album as we put up the biggest tree we've ever had... oh yeah: )
late night Expression Engine tweaks, suggestion posted to EE forum & comment to http://bit.ly/10iuf on Contrast blog… time for bed xx folks
The end is nigh… my father has discovered my twitter feed… hi Dad §: )
thank you Jesus for Image Sizer EE plugin http://bit.ly/LHHS — oh thanks David Rencher too
These Expression Engine templates are stripped back to minimalist glory... I am a happy developer now: )
show her you really care this Christmas http://hoodthong.com/
this was me this morning http://bit.ly/oNFG — now I'm about to jump into the outdoor hot-tub and drink more wine
iPhone twitterific has a bit of difficulty with avatars sometimes... tonight I look suspiciously like Clodagh Kelly
OK time to get out of here… this is just silly at this point… adios cabrons
at the office post-pub to collect a few things for tomorrow morning's meeting… tinkering with CSS, should stop!
gonna use http://mozy.com, http://jungledisk.com or something manual w http://arrsync.sourceforge.net/ for remote backups while travelling
dropbox looks really good but I'd have to place all content I wanted backup up within one folder/directory tree
anyone know of a remote backup service for OS X that would let me set various specific folders to be backed up?
facebook market listing for my iMac http://bit.ly/9jmx let me know if ur interested & please pass on to anyone who may be shopping: )
Back in Dublin.. At Sugar Club for Pierce Turner with my Dad.. Enjoying a comfy seat and a tasty Guinness
Selling my iMac: 20" 2.0Ghz Intel Core Duo, 2GB RAM, 250GB HD... €650 for collection in Dublin City Centre... please pass on details or RT
time for the Ballymore Cluedo World Championship… wish me luck… I have a system, I am invincible: )
The one I was looking for is Dropbox. Thanks @DaveJ. Think I'll give it a go.
I'm trying to remember name of an online backup app that integrates with OS X Finder.. can you help me?
Slept late, hot tub, big fry, now off for a round of pitch&putt.. This is a life of luxury
"If you want to stop receiving marketing messages from eFax® please call 01 6569112" i don't think so, you now become gmail spam
…ah 1990 http://www.myspace.com/giveitalashjack Nostalgia City here in Ballymore tonight
"Give it a lash Jack, give it a lash Jack, never never never say no. Ireland, Ireland, Republic of Ireland, rev it up and here we go"…
"There’s probably no God. Now stop worrying and get on with your life" http://bit.ly/FUL2 — v interesting analysis by Nathalie Rothschild
watching "America 90" our 18 year old home video of summer holidays in Florida and New York… love xmas at home, it's a long affair!
doing manual setup of macbook air… migration assist would put too much crap on… abandoning some bad file management practices… having fun: )
